name: Orbis Stamford
reviews: ... duck sushi, the best king scallops ever, and short rib of beef to die for.
My wife had the prawns which she said were gorgeous.

name: Zada Restaurant
reviews: ... going back probably tonight for another plate of lamb chops, beautiful!!!

name: The Exeter Arms
reviews: We had the beef; beautifully cooked, tasty interesting vegetables, the best...
Lovely helpful staff, great service and excellent food, the beef was superb.

name: The Slanted Door
reviews: There is a separate vegan/vegetarian menu.
Excellent vegan range, though vegan pud was a bit dry...

name: Lambert's
reviews: A long wait for a table, but great sandwich
I had eggs benedict, personally their only downfall is not enough sauce...

name: The Mad Turk
reviews: Had the whipped feta and loaded hummus - both amazing and the T-bone steak was great...
... were a little spicy (I am a wimp) but amazing and the hummus is a must.

name: Paten & Co
reviews: ... sausage, cauliflower croquettes, lamb kofta etc was superb Staff are soo good...
... was accommodating and did a meal mash-up which suited them very well.

name: The Kings Head
reviews: I'm a vegan and my no moo burger was amazing !!!

name: The Tobie Norris
reviews: We shared the meaty Mac and cheese and the duck pizza and I can honestly say it was amazing...
My husband had the pizza wrap with duck, spring onions and hoisin sauce...
